description: Token is needed to access the platform, the functionality of the platform depends on the number of tokens.
The platform is needed by absolutely everyone who trades cryptocurrency. For successful trading, you always need competent analytics and INVI will help you with this.

text: Why should you choose us among many others?
description: Here you can use absolutely all possible types of analysis on one platform. We have integrated into the service everything you need for a qualitative analysis and search for everything you need in one tab. Now you don't have to switch from one service to another to supplement your analytics.
The information is updated in real time and is constantly being trained by AI, which contributes to obtaining the most up-to-date data
